articles.title: Amazon Prime Day 2023: the best tech deals, tips, and latest news - The Verge
articles.description: Amazon Prime Day is the online retail giant’s biggest shopping event of the year, outside of Black Friday / Cyber Monday. It promises big deals and discounts on tech and gadgets like tablets, phones, TVs, games, and more.

articles.title: Ex-Employee Barges Into Bengaluru Tech Firm, Kills CEO, Managing Director - NDTV
articles.description: The Managing Director and the Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of a year-old tech company in Bengaluru were killed by a former employee who barged into their office and attacked them with a sword, said the police.
